channel.title: Divide by 2 the input until it's below a given value (SOLVED)
channel.description: Hi everyone... I'm trying to patch what the title says with no success. I need to read an incoming integer value, and if it exceeds a constant divide it by two, and repeat until it's below that constant. Sound easy enough, but I can't get my head around it. Any help appreciated.

item.title: Divide by 2 the input until it's below a given value (SOLVED)
item.dc:creator: @valmir
item.description:
@valmir wrote:

tele_player:

this just hadn't occurred to me.

Well, that's why we're just users, while he is the Captain... Cheers

Read full topic
